name: meme-vault
title: Meme Vault
description: Store and quickly access your favorite memes, GIFs, and media
author: kevin

commands.name: store-meme
commands.title: Store to Vault
commands.description: Save a meme from a URL (Tenor, Giphy, Twitter, etc.)

commands.name: get-meme
commands.title: Get from Vault
commands.description: Browse and paste your saved memes
